attributes.action: Stop the legal age to buy ciggerrettes going up to 18 and stop drinking going up to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The legal age to buy ciggerettes should stay at the age 16 as many 16 year olds smoke and it will not stop them smoking as they will get older people to buy them anyway, also to stop drinking ages going up to 21.
